attributes.action: Give all NHS staff more than a 1%increase in their wages!
attributes.additional_details:
During the past 12 months every member of the NHS staff have put their lives on the line to save Covid patients....some staff have lost their own lives because of Covid...they’ve caught Covid themselves 
whilst trying to save patients ...the 1% offered to our NHS staff is such an insult and proves to me that the government and politicians don’t care!
attributes.background:
To increase NHS  salaries by more than the paltry 1%. that’s been offered ...it’s an insult to all staff who have worked so very hard during 
this pandemic!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
